name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer proficient in **.NET**, **C#**, **Azure**, **Vue.js**, **React**, **Angular**, and CSS frameworks such as **Tailwind CSS** and **Bootstrap**. Experienced with **CSS Flexbox**, **CSS Grid**, and design tools like **Figma** and **Sketch**. Skilled in testing frameworks including **Playwright**, **Cypress**, and **Jest** for enhancing application quality. Adept in creating responsive, user-friendly interfaces and integrating REST APIs with a focus on performance and usability. With a strong foundation in full-stack development, I have successfully delivered scalable applications in diverse sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, leveraging my expertise to drive automation and promote clean, efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed responsive and dynamic user interfaces with **Vue.js**, **React**, and **Angular**, improving user engagement by 40% through enhanced visual appeal and interactivity.
Utilized CSS frameworks such as **Tailwind CSS** and **Bootstrap** to implement modern design principles, achieving 99% adherence to brand guidelines.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish RESTful APIs for seamless data integration, boosting performance by 30%.
Conducted unit testing using **Jest** and end-to-end testing with **Cypress**, increasing code reliability and reducing bugs by 25% before production deployment.
Designed and implemented UI components using **Storybook**, enhancing development efficiency and component reusability by 50%.
Leveraged **Figma** and **Sketch** for UI design prototypes, streamlining the design-to-development process and improving feedback cycles.
Integrated AI tools to analyze user behavior, resulting in personalized experiences and a 20% uplift in user satisfaction.
Executed database management and querying with **SQL**, ensuring data integrity and maximizing performance across applications.

Utilized **Vue.js** and **React** for developing dynamic, responsive user interfaces, ensuring high performance and maintainability.
Implemented **CSS Flexbox**, **CSS Grid**, and **Tailwind CSS** to create visually appealing layouts, enhancing user experience by 30%.
Integrated AI tools for analytics and user behavior insights, increasing engagement metrics by 25%.
Developed and optimized **REST APIs** for seamless communication between frontend and backend services, effectively reducing latency by 15%.
Collaborated with design teams using **Figma** and **Sketch** for refined UI/UX designs, achieving a project turnaround time reduced by **20%**.
Conducted automated testing using **Cypress** and **Jest**, ensuring reliability of applications and improving test coverage by **40%**.
Engaged in continuous improvement by participating in code reviews and maintaining high coding standards, fostering team collaboration.

Developed interactive frontend components using **Angular** and **CSS** frameworks such as **Tailwind CSS** and **Bootstrap**, enhancing user experience.
Created responsive designs and layouts with **CSS Flexbox** and **CSS Grid**, resulting in a 40% improvement in load times.
Collaborated with UI/UX teams leveraging tools like **Figma** and **Sketch** to deliver visually appealing user interfaces.
Implemented various testing strategies with **Jest** and **Cypress**, achieving a 30% reduction in bugs during the deployment phase.
Integrated backend services through REST APIs, ensuring seamless data flow and optimal performance across platforms.
Utilized **Azure** cloud services for deployment, providing scalable solutions to meet user demands.
